Label: Always show balance in the header
Name: ShowBalance
Description: You'll be able to see your actual balance all the time at the right top corner of the website

Label: Dark Theme
Name: DarkTheme
Description: Dark theme is more convenient for your eyes. And it looks stylish!

Label: Language
Name: Language
Description: Pick the language of the whole application interface

Label: Delete Account
Name: DeleteAccount
Description: If you don't want to use CashScheduler anymore you can delete account to be sure all your personal data is removed

Label: Turn notification on
Name: TurnNotificationsOn
Description: You'll receive a lot of messages from us notifying you about your transactions tendencies and where you spend money more. And many other things

Label: Duplicate to email
Name: DuplicateToEmail
Description: Duplicate all notifications to your email

Label: Turn notification sound on
Name: TurnNotificationsSoundOn
Description: Play sound when a new notification arrives

Label: App token
Name: ConnectedAppsToken
Description: Token that can be used for providing access to your account for other apps in order to get them ability to log transactions for you!
